title: Kaiba Seichoutsuu x Mass Destruction: Reload Mashup

alternative_titles.ja: 海馬成長痛 × Mass Destruction -Reload- マッシュアップ

synopsis:
A mashup of ZUTOMAYO's popular song "Kaiba Seichoutsuu" and the popular song "Mass Destruction -Reload-" from "Persona 3 Reload" has been released! Enjoy it along with the original animation created specifically for this official tie-up.

(Source: Official Youtube, translated)
